references: Norman Sullivan, Test Your Own IQ, Workman Publishing Co. New York, NY, 1994, pp. 48, 50.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,2000
prog: (PARI) { f="b061727.txt"; for (n=1, 1000, a=n*(n + 1)/2; if (a%2, t=a*4, t=a*5); write(f, 2*n - 1, " ", a); write(f, 2*n, " ", t) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 27 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), May 05 2001
